content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * foxglove is an asymmetrical lace weight cowl neck poncho knit in the round from the top down using stockinette and garter stitch cowl and bottom edges are knit in garter stitch bottom slit on short side of poncho allows for ease of arm movement and can be worn on left or right side you will need a *minimum* of 1 575 meters / 1 722 yards wollmeise lace yarn length is adjustable pictured poncho is size 2 and shown on us size 12 dressform enjoy materials *mimimum* 1 722 yards wollmeise lace yarn 3 25mm us3 uk10 circular knitting needles 24 and 40 2 75mm us2 uk12 circular knitting needles 24 and 40 2 stitch markers and 1 unique stitch marker approximate measurements *after blocking* size 1 24 75 inch cowl circumference size 2 26 50 inch cowl circumference size 3 28 25 inch cowl circumference suggested sizing size 1 bust measurement up to 39 inches size 2 bust measurement 40 to 44 inches size 3 bust measurement over 44 inches stitches / techniques used stockinette garter long tail cast on or your favorite stretchy cast on method lifted right and left increases knit into front and back of stitch pattern information number of pages 2 language s english instructions written sizes 3 photos 3
